about_the_game:
Rogue Process is an upcoming first-person shooter created using Unreal Engine 5. Inspired by the early 2000's era of shooters, Rogue Process strives to maintain the gameplay and level design of old while using modern lighting systems, sound systems, AI, and plot to drive the player through an action packed sci-fi/horror experience.

Survive on a space station filled with murderous robots, tactical soldiers, boss battles, and environmental hazards. Use many upgradable weapons to fight through ever improving soldiers and learn how to stop the rogue process that started it all.

Developed by Scrapbox Software

content_descriptors.notes: This game is created for a mature audience. There is use of blood and gore, strong language, and violent themes.

detailed_description:
Rogue Process is an upcoming first-person shooter created using Unreal Engine 5. Inspired by the early 2000's era of shooters, Rogue Process strives to maintain the gameplay and level design of old while using modern lighting systems, sound systems, AI, and plot to drive the player through an action packed sci-fi/horror experience.

Survive on a space station filled with murderous robots, tactical soldiers, boss battles, and environmental hazards. Use many upgradable weapons to fight through ever improving soldiers and learn how to stop the rogue process that started it all.

Developed by Scrapbox Software
name: Rogue Process

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1 version or newer, 64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i5-2500
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon R9 380 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 12
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS, 1920x1080 (low settings)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1 version or newer, 64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended, 60 FPS, 1920x1080 (ultra settings)

short_description: Rogue Process is an upcoming sci-fi/horror first-person shooter inspired by the early 2000's era of shooters. Shoot, run, and platform to ensure your survival. Developed by Scrapbox Software.
